content: launched for charity feel good charity challenge caron® one pound™ 16 oz/453 6 g 812 yds/742 m sizes 2/4 yrs 8/10 yrs & adult note 1 ball will make approx 7 2-4 yrs 5 8-10 yrs and 4 adult hats size u s h/8 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge video is done by mikey of the crochet crowd on his webpage and youtube channel also in caron kindness https //www yarnspirations com/on/demandware static/-/sites-master-catalog-spinrite/default/dw1d8a4ae3/pdf/cac0316-011949m pdf#q=pebbled+hat&includecontent=true&start=1 the videos are also available for left handed crocheters http //thecrochetcrowd com/crochet-pebbled-texture-adult-size-hat/ 1 https //www youtube com/user/mikeyssmail/videos link text 2 1 http //thecrochetcrowd com/crochet-pebbled-texture-adult-size-hat/ 2 https //www youtube com/user/mikeyssmail/videos
